Title: Twilight
Description: A Twitter badge written in Silverlight to show recent tweets on a webpage. The xap file can be hosted locally on your server or on a remote server.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Twitter badge written in Silverlight to show recent tweets on a webpage. The xap file can be hosted locally on your server or on a remote server.

Standard Large Small Tiny


Version 1.5 released with multiple badge & Silverlight Streaming support.

More info about this project can be found on my blog here:
  • http://bryantlikes.com/TwilightASilverlightTwitterBadge.aspx
  • http://bryantlikes.com/TwilightSourceCodePublished.aspx
  • http://bryantlikes.com/Twilight11UsingAYahooPipesProxy.aspx
  • http://bryantlikes.com/Twilight15MultipleViewsWithMVVM.aspx

The project uses code from WrapPanel in the Silverlight Toolkit and the concept of wrapping textblocks in a wrap panel from the LinkLabel Project.
